data.comment: Today's referee, Robert Hartmann, has blown to start the match.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
In the minute 1, Robert Hartmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Bielefeld.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 9, Ritsu Doan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bielefeld.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 10, Robert Hartmann signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Angelino for Leipzig gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 13, Alexander Sorloth of Leipzig is pulled up for offside.
Bielefeld are caught offside.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 14, Free kick Bielefeld.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Robert Hartmann signals a throw-in for Leipzig, close to Bielefeld's area.
In the minute 16, Can Leipzig capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Alexander Sorloth (Leipzig) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
In the minute 17, Robert Hartmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Leipzig drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Leipzig's Marcel Halstenberg attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Robert Hartmann awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
Leipzig's Dani Olmo breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Robert Hartmann awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Leipzig's Angelino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Robert Hartmann signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Leipzig needs to be cautious. Bielefeld have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Leipzig.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
Goal! Angelino gives Leipzig a 1-0 lead in Leipzig.
In the minute 29, That's a fine assist from Lazar Samardzic.
Throw-in Leipzig.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 34, Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
In Leipzig Leipzig drive forward through Angelino. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 36, Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Dani Olmo for Leipzig drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bielefeld's Marcel Hartel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leipzig defender.
In the minute 38, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Red Bull Arena, Mike Van der Hoorn has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
The match at Red Bull Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Anderson Lucoqui, who is down injured.
Anderson Lucoqui has recovered and rejoins the match in Leipzig.
In the minute 45, In Leipzig Bielefeld attack through Ritsu Doan. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
In the minute 45, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Robert Hartmann awards the away team a throw-in.
Christopher Nkunku is replacing Marcel Halstenberg for the home team.
Ibrahima Konate is on a sub for Dayot Upamecano for Leipzig.
Goal! Leipzig extend their lead to 2-0 through Christopher Nkunku.
Great play from Dani Olmo to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Free kick Bielefeld.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Leipzig.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Bielefeld drive upfield and Ritsu Doan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leipzig defender.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 59, Fabian Klos (Bielefeld) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Leipzig.
In the minute 61, Reinhold Yabo for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leipzig.
The home team replace Nordi Mukiele with Amadou Haidara.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Leipzig.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Leipzig make their fourth substitution with Emil Forsberg replacing Dani Olmo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 67, Bielefeld's Anderson Lucoqui gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Robert Hartmann awards Leipzig a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
Andreas Voglsammer is replacing Nils Seufert for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
Uwe Neuhaus (Bielefeld) is making a second substitution, with Sven Schipplock replacing Reinhold Yabo.
In the minute 70, Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Leipzig drive forward but Alexander Sorloth is judged offside.
Marcel Sabitzer is replacing Lazar Samardzic for the home team.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Bielefeld.
Penalty! Robert Hartmann points to the spot, great chance for Leipzig...
Alexander Sorloth (Leipzig) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Marcel Sabitzer (Leipzig) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 75, Uwe Neuhaus is making the team's third substitution at Red Bull Arena with Cebio Soukou replacing Ritsu Doan.
The away team replace Amos Pieper with Joakim Nilsson.
Fabian Klos puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 76, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Robert Hartmann signals a Leipzig throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Bielefeld will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leipzig.
In the minute 77, Anderson Lucoqui is booked for the away team.
Amadou Haidara (Leipzig) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
In the minute 79, Leipzig to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Red Bull Arena.
Free kick Leipzig.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Hartmann awards the away team a throw-in.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 85, Willi Orban (Leipzig) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 86, Bielefeld drive upfield and Fabian Klos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leipzig defender.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Leipzig.
In the minute 87, Bielefeld are coming forward and Joakim Nilsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Leipzig.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Leipzig's Marcel Sabitzer gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Kevin Kampl (Leipzig) has received a first yellow card.
